Text:
TO mcfly 59:

 it is possible to change to french language

1)go into Risen 2 Data folder
2)go into ini folder.
3)open configdefault.xml with WordPad (Not NotePad)
4)press ctrl+f and search "Language"
5) change "russian" or english to "french".
6)If you can't save over this file, click Save As and choose Desktop or someplace easy to find it. 
7)Once its saved, delete the xml file in risen 2 folder and cut andn paste the file.

works for me :D

momolbfr
